In the vast cosmos of fashion, the LILLUSORY Women's Oversized Striped Soft Knit Pullover Sweater is a splendid discovery. Its soft fabric envelops the wearer in comfort, while the elegant stripes evoke the beauty of the universe. The generous fit allows for freedom of movement, reminiscent of celestial bodies in their graceful orbits. The thoughtfully designed chest pocket adds a practical touch, proving that simplicity can hold great purpose. For the price, this quality garment stands as a shining beacon of value, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to fellow seekers of comfort and style.

This style is cute and maybe worth it if you get one of the $20 colorways. The fabric is cheap like most of the crap they sell on this website from China, sadly. It's very true to size, so if you want the really oversized look the model shows in the pictures, you'll want to size up one.
The sweater is thinner than the pics reveal. The color isn't vibrant.

Very soft and flattering. I love the style with the stripes and pockets. The band at the bottom doesn’t dig in and it’s a great material. I wanted a fabric that is cozy, but doesn’t pill or pull, and this is it. I’ve washed it and it’s still in perfect condition. Great quality and fit.
Great quality - will buy in more colors! Lightweight, good for multiple seasons, can be dressed up or worn with jeans. Great purchase!
This sweater fits just as I expected and looks just as I expected. Picture is true representation of product.

I order this in a small/apricot gray. I’m 5’5”, 126lb. I haven’t washed it yet so I’m expecting a little shrinkage since it’s 100% cotton and machine washable but it’s so soft and comfortable. The sleeves aren’t too tight and I like how the shoulder drapes down. The accent colors are also so pretty against the gray color. It’s not super thick which I like so it’s easy to layer. It gives you an expensive look without the cost. Its so versatile and can easily be dressed up or down too.
